xml.name: Extract Method refactoring with returns
xml.Text: With the Extract method refactoring, you can take a code fragment, move it to a separate method and replace the old code with a call to the new method. If the code exits in the return statement, it is extracted as is. Read more about the Extract method refactoring in the Extract a function or a method article.
xml.Try: See that the caret is before the if clause that you can extract. Press ExtractMethod.
Type handler and press EditorEscape to finish this lesson.
